flawed_nl_solution:
She reads 90-60=<<90-60=30>>30 pages in an hour.
She needs to read 210-90=<<210-90=90>>90 more pages.
For an additional 90 pages, she will need 90/30=<<90/30=3>>3 hours.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 120, not 90. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
